attributes.action: Freeze all assets belonging to persons or families named in the panama papers.
attributes.additional_details: The Panama papers which includes 11million pages of evidence of former uk, serving uk government officials, lords and royal family who have evaded tax by hiding their I'll gotten gains abroad. If one person pays tax we all pay tax..
attributes.background: Freeze assets of all families and persons names in the panama papers until all monies owed is paid back in full plus interest.

rejection.details:
In any case, we're not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. The state already has powers to freeze assets under the Terrorist Asset Freezing etc. Act 2010, the Counter Terrorism Act 2008 and Anti-Terrorism, Crime and Security Act 2001.

You could start a new petition asking for the state's asset freezing powers to be extended, but you will need to specify what additional powers you would like to be granted by Parliament.
